mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.category_name, c.url, c.priority, c.create_time, c.update_time FROM anvil_category c ORDER BY c.priority asc
SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.category_name, c.url FROM anvil_role_assign a, anvil_category c WHERE a.category_id = c.id AND a.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT id, CONCAT((SELECT category_name FROM anvil_category WHERE id = a.parent_id), '-', category_name) AS combinationName FROM anvil_category a WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT category_id FROM anvil_role_assign WHERE role_id = #{roleId}) AND parent_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT c.id as parent_id, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM anvil_role_assign WHERE category_id IN (SELECT id FROM anvil_category WHERE parent_id = c.id) AND role_id = #{roleId}) AS counts FROM anvil_category c WHERE parent_id IS NULL

SELECT id, CONCAT((SELECT category_name FROM anvil_category WHERE id = a.parent_id), '-', category_name) AS combinationName FROM anvil_category a WHERE id IN (SELECT category_id FROM anvil_role_assign WHERE role_id = #{roleId}) AND parent_id IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO anvil_category (parent_id, category_name, url, priority, create_time, update_time ) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{categoryName}, #{url}, #{priority}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE anvil_category SET parent_id=#{parentId}, category_name=#{categoryName}, url=#{url}, priority=#{priority}, update_time=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM anvil_role_assign WHERE role_id=#{roleId} and category_id=#{categoryId}
